resources.string: 我已仔细阅读并同意上述条款
为了给您提供更好的服务，您需要阅读并同意用户协议与隐私政策才可继续使用系统，我们将严格遵守相关法律法规和隐私政策以保护您的个人信息。
我们将严格遵守相关法律法规和隐私政策以保护您的个人信息。
我已仔细阅读并同意上述条款

string.name: provision_service_policy_download
string.Data: 请您阅读并同意<a href=%1$s>《迅雷隐私政策》</a >与<a href=%1$s>《迅雷公司网络服务使用协议》</a >

resources.string: 体验激动人心的 HyperOS 吧！
Some features aren\'t available without Root/Su permission
Are you sure you want to restart now %1$s?
The module isn\'t activated yet. Please check if LSPosed is enabled. If so, please restart or re-optimize the module.
Failed to end process. Please check if HyperCeiler has been granted Root/Su permissions.
Failed to start activity. Please check if HyperCeiler has been granted Root/Su permissions.
The target app isn\'t running and doesn\'t need to be restarted.
Reboot failed. Please check if HyperCeiler has been granted Root/Su permission.
HyperCeiler was unexpectedly closed. To help us fix this, provide the information below:\n\n
%1$s has entered Safe mode due to multiple crashes, and HyperCeiler features has been temporarily disabled.
%1$s is still in Safe mode and HyperCeiler features has been disabled. Disable Safe mode?
Tip: Here is the default tip. If you can see me, it means that there\'s a problem with HyperCeiler. Please report it to the developer in a timely and effective manner.
The source of the ROM you\'re using may not be an official Xiaomi ROM, and some features may not work. Please contact your supplier for more details.
The current device is running on a system version that isn\'t (fully) adapted, which may result in anomalies in the HyperCeiler functionality.
The signature verification failed, and the current version you\'re using may not be from the official version of HyperCeiler, and may contain malicious code.

Safe mode can unhook some apps in time when they crash multiple times to ensure security. This feature requires the System Framework hook scope to run. We strongly recommend checking the System Framework scope to turn on Safe mode.
You can select text after long or double press, or copy it and send it back to the developer.
Today is HyperCeiler\'s birthday!\nThank you for your support over the past year, and let\'s continue to work together this year!
Today in history: Sevtinge delivered an important speech on July 14, 2022.
The current device log service is abnormal and HyperCeiler features will be limited. Please restore the log service so that it can run normally.\nError code: %1$s
The current device log service is abnormal and HyperCeiler features will be limited. Please restore the log service so that it can run normally.
